extendedInfo.description: ** Note this keyboard skin requires V5 of Touchpal **This keyboard skin works for:â TouchPal v5FEATURESâº Press effectsâº Crisp graphicsâº Thoroughly skinnedâº Stark contrast for optimal visibilityâº Accessible through TouchPal Keyboard's Settings!INSTALL1. Close out of the Play Store2. Open TouchPal Keyboard Settings. You can do so by opening the keyboard and hitting the button on the top left or by going into device settings -> language & keyboard -> TouchPal v5 -> General Settings3. Go to Skin, select the skin and hit the check mark to applyEnjoy!SUPPORTIf you have any questions or wish to make a request, refer to our contact address or social addresses below! reviews.title: Can\'t install it.
reviews.comment: It looks great, but for some reason it doesn\'t show up as an option. I\'ve paid but can\'t use .it.
reviews.author: John Casey

reviews.title: Very nice.
reviews.comment: Developer is on top of things too with Touchpals updates.
